@garonsen @geekeasy Wanted to spread the word. I think if people are getting calls they should make that known. Very curious what it's about

@geekeasy I'm personally really interested in the fact it was an OPD officer calling. Investigating Nov 2. Kayvan mentioned. @garonsen
@garonsen Are they still conducting more investigation for Frazier report? Thought that was released? Or are they doing more?
@garonsen Do you remember what officer was calling? Trying to figure out if this is happening to everyone, or based on some targeting.

Drawing s'more. I should be sleeping or homeworking. I'm tired of feeling guilty about this stuff. I should just embrace my life...
Playing drums for a bit- hoping it's not too late and the neighbors won't kill me.
Playing Hex with Nietzche again. I'm playing better than last time.
